children.heading: Purpose
children.text:
This is an example evaluation of project risks related to development of ReqView tool using failure mode and effects analysis (FMEA).

Note: The document is not complete.

children.heading: Instructions
children.text: Describe failures and organize them into document sections by functions, items or process step.

For each failure mode enter a row and fill in following information in the corresponding column:

  • Description - Describe the failure mode
  • Type - Set to "Risk"
  • Potential Effects - Describe potential impact of the failure on the system output or system users.
  • Potential Causes - Describe the causes of the failure.
  • Detection Mode - Describe what are the existing design controls detecting the failure or preventing the failure from occurring.
  • SEV - Rate the current failure severity by a number 1 (least severe) to 10 (most severe).
  • PROB - Rate the current failure probability by a number 1 (least likely) to 10 (most likely).
  • DET - Rate the current failure detectability by a number 1 (best detectable) to 10 (least detectable).
  • RPN - Calculate the current Risk Priority Number as RPN = SEV * PROB * DET.

For each failure mode which needs to be mitigated identify corrective actions reducing the occurrence of the cause or improving the detection. Enter each action as a child row and fill in following information in the corresponding column:

  • Description - Describe the actions for reducing the occurrence of the cause or improving the detection.
  • Type - Set to "Action" value
  • Responsibility - Name a responsible person for the recommended action.
  • Target Date - Set a target date for the recommended action.
  • SEV - Rate the new failure severity by a number 1 (least severe) to 10 (most severe).
  • PROB - Rate the new failure probability by a number 1 (least likely) to 10 (most likely).
  • DET - Rate the new failure detectability by a number 1 (best detectable) to 10 (least detectable).
  • RPN - Calculate the new Risk Priority Number as RPN = SEV * PROB * DET.

columns.label: RPN
